subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets or someone else — pronounce that Yankees — would give Johan Santana the money for a contract extension next fall when he could be a free agent, so why not give it to him now?
snippet: The Mets or someone else — pronounce that Yankees — would give Johan Santana the money for a contract extension next fall when he could be a free agent, so why not give it to him now?
